short_summary: Automated distiller system to establish VOC concentration limits for certain products
description: Automated distiller unit to support regulations of Volatile Organic Compounds (VOC) concentration limits for certain products. Includes on-site installation, training, preventative maintenance, and warranty and maintenance services. Wholesaler commits to establishing and supplying VOC concentration limits on certain products for a period of 5 years.
full_summary:
### Automated Distiller System
#### Amendment to Closing Time 

**Reference Number:** WS3573710866-Doc3658251872
**Solicitation Number:** WS3573710866
**Publication Date:** September 8, 2022 
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** September 28, 2022, 2:00 pm (Eastern Daylight Time)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal - Under Request for Proposal (RFP) `WS3573710866`

**Subject:** Supply of Automated Distiller System

**Introduction:**
Environment and Climate Change Canada invites suppliers to bid on the provision of an Automated Distiller System for supporting the upcoming regulations of Volatile Organic Compounds (VOC) concentration limits for certain products. 

**Key Requirements:**

* Supply of one (1) Automated Distiller System
* On-site installation and training services
* One (1) preventative maintenance visit
* Twelve (12) month warranty and maintenance and support services

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* All bidders must comply with the requirements outlined in the RFP.
* Bidders must comply with all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.
* The contract will be awarded to the responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price.

**Amendment:**

* The closing time of the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and Buyandsell posting closing time has been amended to September 28, 2022, 2:00 pm (Eastern Daylight Time).
* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be completed by the revised closing time to be considered responsive.

**Submission Details:**

* Interested suppliers shall submit their tender proposal electronically through the Ariba Discovery website.
* Tender submissions must comply with all requirements outlined in the RFP and the specified evaluation criteria.

**Important Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: September 28, 2022, 2:00 pm (Eastern Daylight Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: September 8, 2022 (TBD)
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2028

**Contact Information:**

* For any questions or concerns regarding this tender, please contact the Contracting Authority at amber.trotechaud@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 

Note: This document is a response to a government tender and is published in the public domain. It does not include any proprietary or confidential information.
